user_query: I'm organizing a company event and I need a reliable text-to-speech converter with a variety of speaker options. Can you list the available speakers, their genders, and the languages they can speak? Also, provide me with a chat history with the Islam&AI Bot discussing the importance of teamwork in Islam.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a list of available text-to-speech speakers along with their genders and the languages they support.
Fetch the chat history with the Islam&AI Bot regarding the importance of teamwork in Islam.
